RuleDetails.Rules:
Admin Fee IRR 750,000 Apply For Refund / Change Per Ticket
Refund: After 21 Working Days

APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 022/KK17
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
POS THR PUBLISHED FARES STRUCTURAL
 APPLICATION
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP JOURNEYS.

SEASONALITY
FOR HIGH SEASON FARES
  PERMITTED 11JUN THROUGH 30SEP OR 10MAR THROUGH 24MAR.

FLIGHT APPLICATION
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY KK FLIGHT
        ANY UH FLIGHT.

ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
FOR K- TYPE FARES
  WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
  OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
  WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 60 DAYS BEFORE
  DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 20 DAYS AFTER
  RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL 59 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 30 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 11 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL 29 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 20 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 7 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL 19 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 7 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 2 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL 6 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 2 DAYS BEFORE
       DEPARTURE.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 4 HOURS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL 1 DAY BEFORE
       DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 1 DAY BEFORE
       DEPARTURE.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 1 HOUR AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE
       SAME TIME.
       OPEN RETURNS PERMITTED.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.

MAXIMUM STAY
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12
  MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

STOPOVERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  UNLIMITED STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT.

TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  UNLIMITED FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
     FARE COMPONENT.

PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
   DOUBLE OPEN JAWS NOT PERMITTED.
   END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
    -TO FORM SINGLE OPEN JAWS.
     MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN
     MILEAGE OF THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT.
    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
    OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS NOTE -
      WHEN FARES ARE COMBINED THE MOST RESTRICTIVE
      CONDITION APPLY INCLUDING CANCELLATION AND
      REFUNDS.
    -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS
     A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
     PERMITTED.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER KK IN ANY
      RULE IN ANY TARIFF.

BLACKOUT DATES
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

SURCHARGES
FROM/TO THR FOR -IR TYPE FARES
  A SURCHARGE OF USD 15.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE
  APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL FROM 15MAR 17 THROUGH
  05APR 17
  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 10.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO
       THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL ON THU FROM
       17DEC 16 THROUGH 14MAR 17
  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 10.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO
       THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL ON THU FROM
       06APR 17 THROUGH 30JUN 17
  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 3.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO
       THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL ON WED FROM
       17DEC 16 THROUGH 14MAR 17
  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 3.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO
       THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL ON WED FROM
       06APR 17 THROUGH 30JUN 17.

TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 10JAN 16.

SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 10JAN 16.

PENALTIES
FOR K- TYPE FARES
  CANCELLATIONS
    BEFORE DEPARTURE
      CHARGE USD 40.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND.
    AFTER DEPARTURE
      TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW.
         NOTE -
          NO SHOW - NOT PERMITTED
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      CHANGES PERMITTED.

HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  VALID ON KK ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.

TOURS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  FARES APPLY IN CONJUNCTION WITH A TOUR WITH TOUR NUMBER
  THRR001.

APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 022/KK17
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
POS THR PUBLISHED FARES STRUCTURAL
 APPLICATION
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP JOURNEYS.

SEASONALITY
FOR HIGH SEASON FARES
  PERMITTED 11JUN THROUGH 30SEP OR 10MAR THROUGH 24MAR.

FLIGHT APPLICATION
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY KK FLIGHT
        ANY UH FLIGHT.

ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
FOR X- TYPE FARES
  RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
  WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
  WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 60 DAYS BEFORE
  DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 20 DAYS AFTER
  RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL
       59 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 30
       DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 11 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL
       29 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 20
       DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 7 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL
       19 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 7
       DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 2 DAYS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL
       6 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 2
       DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 4 HOURS AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL
       1 DAY BEFORE DEPARTURE AND ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 1
       DAY BEFORE DEPARTURE.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.
       TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 1 HOUR AFTER
       RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.
  OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING MUST BE
       COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME.
       WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED.

MAXIMUM STAY
FOR X- TYPE FARES
  TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 6
  MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

STOPOVERS
FOR X- TYPE FARES
  2 FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH
      DIRECTION IN TURKEY.
  OR - 2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH
           DIRECTION AT USD 60.00 EACH.

TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  UNLIMITED FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
     FARE COMPONENT.

PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
   DOUBLE OPEN JAWS NOT PERMITTED.
   END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
    -TO FORM SINGLE OPEN JAWS.
     MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN
     MILEAGE OF THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT.
    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
    OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS NOTE -
      WHEN FARES ARE COMBINED THE MOST RESTRICTIVE
      CONDITION APPLY INCLUDING CANCELLATION AND
      REFUNDS.
    -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS
     A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
     PERMITTED.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER KK IN ANY
      RULE IN ANY TARIFF.

BLACKOUT DATES
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 10.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO

  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 10.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO

  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 3.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO

       17DEC 16 THROUGH 14MAR 17
  OR - A SURCHARGE OF USD 3.00 PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO
       THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR PEAK TRAVEL ON WED FROM
       06APR 17 THROUGH 30JUN 17.

TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 10JAN 16.

SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 10JAN 16.

PENALTIES
FOR X- TYPE FARES
  CANCELLATIONS
    BEFORE DEPARTURE
      CHARGE USD 60.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND.
    AFTER DEPARTURE
      TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW.
         NOTE -
          NO SHOW - NOT PERMITTED
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 40.00.

HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  VALID ON KK ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.

UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  FARES APPLY IN CONJUNCTION WITH A TOUR WITH TOUR NUMBER
